Preface to the Continued Catalogue of the Buddhist Canon of the Great Tang, if correct, the Dharma name is Bao Chong, truly or possibly due to the wise, this is the common Dharma ferry
The true ocean of the sages is lofty and vast, passing through the directions like the sun and moon, being in the noble and humble, illuminating

The beauty of the flourishing of the Way, how could it not be with the fishing net of my inverted understanding, needing to prove the precious position of the poor living beings? Since the fairy garden announced the completion, the famous water purified the crossing, manifesting to the myriad kinds, speaking with the hand about the dust covering, following the timing and conditions to speak the strategy, due to the abiding nature and desires to see the sound teaching, the net completely cut off, encompassing the great thousand, those who receive its Way

single reasons. The narration does not know the cause of the transmission. The third part of the continuation of the record of the collection of sÅ«tras from various eras, in total,

The meaning is not wrong. At that time, it is categorized according to the section. It is concise but not yet self-sufficient. The remaining continuation of the sÅ«tras from various eras has a title or
has a missing text. The fifth part of the record says that it comprehensively examines the various records and compares their definitive texts. There are no separate editions from different places.

It has not yet been able to separately display the title to prevent it. The sixth part of the continuation of the record of the commentaries composed by the clergy and laity of the Way says that the commentaries
explain the words of the former sages to communicate the incomplete understanding. The previous and later separate titles continue the record. If one seeks different explanations,
The seventh record of the continuation of the teachings of the various scriptures and their branches, namely the scriptures of separate origin that are not translated into this continuation

The translation of the extensive version is simply to connect with beginners, all of which are verses, it should not be taken lightly. The eighth record of the continuation of the teachings of the suspected false scriptures and treatises, namely the profound and distant true Dharma that ordinary fools have not yet reached, following the customs of the lower teachings
There are true scriptures, therefore this record is continued. The ninth preface to the record of the beginning and end of the continuation of the teachings of the various scriptures,

Namely, the scripture records are not exhaustive, this record is continued. The tenth record of the continuation of the teachings of the various scriptures that respond to the feelings and arouse respect,

Namely, the scriptures of the Eastern Xia respond to the auspicious signs, and there are those who are blessed and increase their faith, therefore this record is continued. The first part of the continuation of the record of the inner canon of the Great Tang, the continuation of the teachings of the various scriptures,
The record of the sources of the transmission and translation, the initial brief transmission of the sounds.
Then Xuan Su relied on it to open the foundation.
The wise queen valued its meaning and pattern.
Her feelings were in the supervision and protection.
The dark ruler followed its norms and tracks.
They merely follow each other.
Therefore, starting from the Later Han Dynasty up to the Tang Dynasty,
The world has changed from pure to corrupt, but the principles remain the same.
All have revered and inherited the supreme teachings,
As the fundamental standard for eliminating afflictions.
Understanding the profound blueprint,
Reflecting on the fundamental basis of life and death.
Therefore, they are able to transmit the Brahma Net from generation to generation, making it flourish.
This is the continuous flow of Dharma giving, which never ceases from time to time.
Then, the five regions of the West respect the heavenly words,
And the nine provinces of the East follow the bird's traces.
Therefore, the heavenly books and heavenly language,
Are beyond the thoughts of the distant islands.
The eight forms and six patterns,
Have rarely been seen in the great summer.
Thus, the previously heard is re-translated and only then seen here.
However, the national history and the ritual classics,
Emphasize prose and poetry alternately.
The Buddha's words and the secular classics,
The language and principles are naturally divided.
How can this be known?
The Buddha's teaching of the Dharma puts the Way first.
Opening the ignorant and resolving doubts, removing obstacles.
It is not in literary embellishments, nor does it exist in scrolls.
The intention is to enlighten the obscurity of emotions and principles,
And to reach the subtlety of spiritual thoughts.
This is its purpose.
Listen attentively, listen attentively.
Think about it well.
I will explain it for you.
These are the sacred words.
Excellent, excellent!
I joyfully wish to hear it.
I only wish that the World-Honored One would explain it in detail.
This is the Dharma that is received.
Repeating the words makes the meaning clear, without worrying about being verbose.
Just discuss the correct words, do not arrange them in literary form.
This is the original sutra.
The translation follows the customs of the region.
Following the popular transmission, many fall into floating falsehoods.
What is lost is much.
Therefore, Dao An's treatise on the five losses is easy to follow.
Yan Cong's composition on the eight inversions is difficult to reach.
This is truly the evidence.
The other popular practices are not worth mentioning.
Now I record the wise translators of the imperial era,
And reveal the biased competition of the rulers' faith and slander.
To be the first record.
Moreover, in the reigns of the Han, Jin, Sui, and Tang dynasties,
The world was greatly unified.
When the year and month arrived, the Dharma gate was unified.
In the Wei, Song, Qi, Liang, and other dynasties,
The land was divided and cracked.
The Chinese and barbarians participated in politics and translations came out together.
As for the extensive texts that surpassed the past,
It can be seen that the brilliant radiance was far-reaching.
Now, following their times, they are compiled.
The works written by monks and laypeople are appended at the end.
I hope that future generations will see them as if facing them.
